[00:01.31]KSI：
[00:01.77]
[00:09.93]I'm gon' need therapy
[00:12.01]
[00:14.72]'Cause you're not here with me
[00:16.74]
[00:19.49]Light me up like amphetamines yeah
[00:22.40]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:23.88]

[00:26.75]Lil Wayne：
[00:27.41]
[00:27.92]I I I-I
[00:31.20]
[00:32.32]Wish I could lie
[00:35.83]
[00:37.30]You got me fallin' thinkin' of you
[00:40.65]Thinkin' of you
[00:42.20]But that's the one thing I shouldn't do
[00:45.39]I shouldn't do
[00:46.74]I I know the truth
[00:50.29]Know the truth
[00:51.47]I I know that you're just one more thing to lose
[00:57.15]Uh she loves me she loves me not
[00:58.92]Patience I'm runnin' out
[01:00.08]Walkin' all over me made me a stompin' ground
[01:02.47]Baby you f**ked around gave me the run-around
[01:04.83]Makin' me wonder how crazy and dumb I sound
[01:07.21]Takin' me up and down baby I'm comin' down
[01:09.61]I'ma need some extermination I'm buggin' out
[01:12.05]Stay for another round maybe she'll come around
[01:14.41]She gon' have me turnin' in my grave when I'm underground
[01:17.04]Sore loser I saw you with him I almost threw up
[01:20.59]Don't shoot her don't talk to her
[01:22.94]There's plenty fish in the sea and I miss your b***h
[01:25.04]Like my cute thing you got me fallin' for you
[01:27.83]With no wings on no parachute
[01:29.53]Bring a star back for you
[01:30.71]They say love's a lost art
[01:31.97]I draw that for you and I fall back for you
[01:34.15]KSI/Lil Wayne：
[01:34.57]You got me fallin' thinkin' of you
[01:37.81]You got me fallin'
[01:39.25]But that's the one thing I shouldn't do
[01:42.03]The one thing that I shouldn't do
[01:44.13]I I know the truth
[01:47.30]Know the truth I know the truth
[01:49.07]I I know that you're just one more thing to lose
[01:54.04]KSI：
[01:54.27]
[01:54.92]I be actin' out I know I know
[01:57.09]When I stare at you I lose control
[01:59.78]And I'm hopin' you're not psychic
[02:01.56]Psychic
[02:02.01]Hotter than the devil but you're righteous
[02:03.82]Yeah
[02:04.47]I'm addicted to the whole of you
[02:06.02]Whole of you
[02:06.77]Calling 'cause I needed more
[02:08.45]More
[02:09.09]Stalling 'cause you know I fall
[02:11.05]My whole demeanor and all the fact of me losin' you
[02:14.56]You
[02:15.02]Comparin' and stuck in a loop
[02:16.73]Loop
[02:17.23]Grow old 'til there's nothin' to do
[02:19.09]Do
[02:19.60]I'm alone in this space and my story is endin' with you
[02:22.28]I I I-I
[02:25.19]
[02:26.22]Wish I could lie
[02:29.89]KSI/Lil Wayne：
[02:30.41]
[02:31.32]You got me fallin' thinkin' of you
[02:34.82]You got me fallin'
[02:35.43]You got me fallin'
[02:36.24]But that's the one thing I shouldn't do
[02:39.26]I shouldn't do
[02:39.74]The one thing that I shouldn't do
[02:41.02]I I know the truth
[02:43.98]Know the truth I know the truth
[02:45.58]I I know that you're just one more thing to lose
[02:51.03]Lil Wayne：
[02:51.53]I'm gon' need therapy
[02:53.31]Oh no
[02:55.41]
[02:56.19]You naked next to me
[02:58.23]Oh oh yeah
[03:01.02]Light me up like amphetamines yeah
[03:03.80]Yeah yeah

[03:07.97]Guarantees
[03:08.98]

[03:12.84]
[03:13.81]Wish I could lie
data.trans:
[ti:Lose]
[ar:KSI/Lil Wayne]
[al:Lose]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.24]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.31]//
[00:01.77]
[00:09.93]我需要些心理治疗
[00:12.01]
[00:14.72]因你不在我的身边
[00:16.74]
[00:19.49]你如安非他命那般让我振奋
[00:22.40]//
[00:23.88]
[00:24.38]无法给你承诺
[00:26.75]//
[00:27.41]
[00:27.92]我
[00:31.20]
[00:32.32]希望我能撒谎
[00:35.83]
[00:37.30]你让我为你沦陷 我脑海里全是你
[00:40.65]脑海里全是你
[00:42.20]但我不应如此
[00:45.39]不应如此
[00:46.74]我知道事实会如何发展
[00:50.29]心知吐明
[00:51.47]我知道我会失去你
[00:57.15]她爱我还是不爱我
[00:58.92]我快没有耐心
[01:00.08]你在我身上留下不可磨灭的印记
[01:02.47]宝贝 你将我玩弄于鼓掌之上
[01:04.83]你让我意识到我是如此疯狂愚蠢
[01:07.21]因你我的心情跌宕起伏 宝贝我在坠落深渊
[01:09.61]我需要个了结 我的系统就要崩溃
[01:12.05]我将会再停留一次 或许她会想清楚的
[01:14.41]就算我长眠于地下 她也不会让我得到安宁
[01:17.04]嫉妒的我看到你和他在一起 我都快要恶心死了
[01:20.59]不要和她说话 不要纠缠下去
[01:22.94]天涯何处无芳草 我想念你身旁的女人
[01:25.04]喜欢我可爱的宝贝 是你让我为你沦陷
[01:27.83]没有翅膀和降落伞 我坠入了爱河
[01:29.53]我会为你摘星
[01:30.71]人们说爱是一门遗失的艺术
[01:31.97]让我一一为你描绘爱情 为你沦陷
[01:34.15]//
[01:34.57]你让我为你沦陷 我脑海里全是你
[01:37.81]为你沦陷
[01:39.25]但我不应如此
[01:42.03]不应如此
[01:44.13]我知道事实会如何发展
[01:47.30]心知吐明
[01:49.07]我知道我会失去你
[01:54.04]//
[01:54.27]
[01:54.92]我知道我最近行为出格
[01:57.09]当我凝视着你 我便失去控制
[01:59.78]我希望你不会读懂我心
[02:01.56]读懂我心
[02:02.01]你比恶魔还要火辣 但你又是正直的
[02:03.82]//
[02:04.47]为你感到上瘾
[02:06.02]全部的你
[02:06.77]我联系你是因为我需要更多的爱
[02:08.45]需要更多
[02:09.09]故作拖延是因为你知道我沦陷了
[02:11.05]我失去你后的种种表现
[02:14.56]你
[02:15.02]互相比较 陷入无尽循环
[02:16.73]无尽循环
[02:17.23]一起慢慢变老 直到无事可做
[02:19.09]无事可做
[02:19.60]我孤独地伫立此地 我的终局是你
[02:22.28]我
[02:25.19]
[02:26.22]希望我能撒谎
[02:29.89]//
[02:30.41]
[02:31.32]你让我为你沦陷 我脑海里全是你
[02:34.82]为你沦陷
[02:35.43]为你沦陷
[02:36.24]但我不应如此
[02:39.26]不应如此
[02:39.74]不应如此
[02:41.02]我知道事实会如何发展
[02:43.98]心知吐明
[02:45.58]我知道我会失去你
[02:51.03]//
[02:51.53]我需要些心理治疗
[02:53.31]//
[02:55.41]
[02:56.19]你在我旁褪去衣衫
[02:58.23]//
[03:01.02]你如安非他命那般让我振奋
[03:03.80]//
[03:05.16]无法给你承诺
[03:07.97]承诺
[03:08.98]
[03:09.58]我
[03:12.84]
[03:13.81]希望我能撒谎
